name: Form.io Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Form.io Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle form.io events via webhooks

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger Events | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
